subject: College Athletics
Diet and Nutrition
Colleges and Universities
organizations: Collegiate and Professional Sports Dietitians Assn
lead_paragraph: N.C.A.A. rules permit only one team-provided meal per day, as well as snacks, and critics say that is not enough.
snippet: N.C.A.A. rules permit only one team-provided meal per day, as well as snacks, and critics say that is not enough.
